title: PDF Accessibility Checker (PAC)
creator: PDF/UA Foundation
description: The PDF Accessibility Checker (PAC) is a free and easy to use tool for checking the accessibilty of PDF documents. It was initially released in 2010 and was the first automated PDF/UA compliance validation tool. PAC 2021 supports as well all machine checkable requirements of WCAG 2.1 AA.
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
Section 508, <abbr title="United States">US</abbr> federal procurement standard
